title: I Rode The Four-Wheeled Thing New York City Says Is a Bicycle: Eurobike 2024
content:
The future of last-mile deliveries might be on cargo e-bikes, but there's a good chance they look an awful lot like this.

Read the full article at I Rode The Four-Wheeled Thing New York City Says Is a Bicycle: Eurobike 2024 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
